title: Dr. Martens Orson Brown Leather Mule Sandals UK 4 US M5 W6.5 Unisex
listperfectly_description:
Slip into retro Dr. Martens comfort for easy summer errands and weekend hangs.
These Dr. Martens Orson leather mule slide sandals feature a pebbled brown upper, open toe, and classic yellow welt stitching over an AirWair sole. Made in Thailand with a suede footbed, they wear as an easy unisex slip-on for casual outfits and warm-weather travel. Marked UK 4 (US M 5 / US W 6.5 / EU 37) with a 9 in insole; fit note: wearer (US W7.5) found them slightly small, likely fits US W6.5.
Included is one pair of unisex Dr. Martens sandals.
- Unisex Sandals (pair)
Measured for fit:
- Insole length: 9 in (22.9 cm)
Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed--grab them before they're gone.
